ygData.subject: Heritrix 3.1.0 with Hbase
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi All, Is there a way to make heritrix to write crawled data to Hbase? I know we can use hbase-writer but it seems outdated and doesn t support heritrix 3.1.0

know

heri=
trix 3.1.0 and Hbase 0.90.x.
